original_text: A new commandment I give to you, that you love one another: just as I have loved you, you also are to love one another.
korean_text: 새 계명을 너희에게 주노니 서로 사랑하라 내가 너희를 사랑한 것 같이 너희도 서로 사랑하라

sentences.original_text: A new commandment I give to you
just as I have loved you
you also are to love one another
